amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Criminal Records Upgrade Program by $1.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Criminal Records Upgrade Program by $1,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Boswell.
